long_description: The women's soft, super lightweight Helly Hansen Rochelle Jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable as well as stylishly modern for city forays. Packs easily into your handbag or work case. Durable Helly Tech(R) Protection 2.5-ply laminate construction is fully seam-sealed and dependably waterproof, windproof and breathable. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off rain and snow. Full storm flap covers front zipper. Adjustable hood stows away inside zippered collar compartment. Removable belt lets you customize your look. Underarm ventilation eyelets. Water-resistant zippered hand pockets; single chest pocket; anti-chafe chin guard. Water-resistant zippered adjustable cuffs slide easily on and off over gloves.
short_description: The women's soft, super lightweight Helly Hansen Rochelle Jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable as well as stylishly modern for city forays. Packs easily into your handbag or work case.
